data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pitton, Thafarel, Lofego, Antonio C., Rezende, José M. (2016): Three new species of Xenotarsonemus (Acari: Tarsonemidae) from the northwestern region of São Paulo State, Brazil. Zootaxa 4138 (3): 534-548, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4138.3.6
